channel.title: Can someone make me a client?
channel.description: can someone plz help me get my source into my client, ill like give u a dollar or sumthing lol Teamviwer?

item.title: Can someone make me a client?
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

If you have teamviewer, pm me your id and pass… I guess i’ll get this done with.

item.title: Can someone make me a client?
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

YOU put your no-ip/hamachi/utorrent whatever you portforwarded with ip in the client.java client-sided, upload it to example: uppit.com you give them the file… and they run it.

Simple enough?

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make me a client?

item.title: Can someone make me a client?
item.dc:creator: @thejudge thejudge
item.description:
@thejudge wrote:

i know that,
but all i have to do is have my ip online with my source running, and ppl put my ip in my client and they can get on?

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone make me a client?

item.title: Can someone make me a client?
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

You Have to be the one to run the source run.bat for it to be online, they only have to double click the run.bat in the client file to get on, but they can’t login unless you have the source run.bat running+portforwarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone make me a client?
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:403758”][quote author=thejudge link=topic=500821.msg3663439#msg3663439 date=1310486120]
can someone plz help me get my source into my client, ill like give u a dollar or sumthing lol Teamviwer?
[/quote]

No.[/quote]

I told him not to ask for spoon-feeding anyway.
OT: judge, you need(recommended) to jar your cache with jarmaker before you upload it and release it, it would make it alot smaller, if thats what you were wanting?

item.title: Can someone make me a client?
item.dc:creator: @thejudge thejudge
item.description:
@thejudge wrote:

lol im a begginer and a nub so i dont know what jar is lol i hear it all the time though but

ok you know how when your running a server yourself, you click run source, then go to the client and click run, they both connect…

like you know how when ppl release there server for other to play on it, its just one client they download and they click run.bat and there playing on your server…

thats what i wana do… just make it one client.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone make me a client?
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

Why pay for something that does it on it’s own? When you run your source & client they connect to eachother, depending on how you portforwarded and what not is determined when others connect.

Edit: please stop asking for people to do it for you, you’ll never get better if you do.

Read full topic
